revision.text: '''Spelon''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Tamato]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of spicy and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Tamato]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
